header.heroTitle: Subscription to Eric REIT Investment Fund Starts

about.description: The diversified Eric REIT investment fund is a closed real estate investment fund publicly traded on the main market. It complies with Islamic Sharia principles and was established in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia under the regulations of real estate investment funds. The fund's portfolio consists of seven income-generating properties diversified by sector and location. The fund aims to achieve periodic rental income and distribute at least 90% of the net profits semi-annually.
about.subtitle: Total Fund Size
about.title: SAR 1,210,000,000
about.prfitRules: The fund aims to distribute profits semi-annually

statistics.firstTitle: Diverse Real Estate Portfolio Across Saudi Arabia
statistics.secondTitle: Diverse Real Estate Portfolio Across Saudi Arabia

directorsData.name: Khaled bin Abdulaziz Al-Reis
directorsData.position: Chairman of the Fund's Board of Directors
directorsData.about: Mr. Khaled is the Chief Executive Officer of Capital Investment Company.
directorsData.bio: Mr. Khaled is the Chief Executive Officer of Capital Investment Company. He has over 20 years of practical experience in the fields of investment banking, investment management, direct investments, and private equity. He holds a Master of Business Administration (MBA) and a Master's degree in Financial Sciences from the University of Denver, Colorado, USA. He is also a certified financial analyst.

directorsData.name: Mohammed bin Mutuq Al-Jamid
directorsData.position: Member of the Fund's Board of Directors
directorsData.about: Mr. Mohammed is the Head of Real Estate Investment Operations at Capital Investment.
directorsData.bio: Mr. Mohammed is the Head of Real Estate Investment Operations at Capital Investment. He has over 20 years of practical experience in operations related to various investment products, including stock brokerage, bonds, initial public offerings, private equity, and real estate investment funds. He holds a diploma in banking operations from the Institute of Public Administration in Riyadh.

directorsData.name: Eng. Abdullah bin Abdul Karim Al-Mazrou
directorsData.position: Member of the Fund's Board of Directors
directorsData.about: Mr. Abdullah is the Chief Executive Officer of Al-Mutlaq Real Estate Investment Company.
directorsData.bio: Mr. Abdullah is the Chief Executive Officer of Al-Mutlaq Real Estate Investment Company. He has over 25 years of practical experience in facilities management and maintenance in the banking and telecommunications sectors. He holds a Bachelor's degree in Mechanical Engineering from King Saud University, in addition to obtaining various professional certifications and courses in project management and facilities management.

directorsData.name: Saleh bin Omar bin Hidara
directorsData.position: Member of the Fund's Board of Directors
directorsData.about: Mr. Saleh is the Chief Financial Officer at Al-Mutlaq Real Estate Investment Company.
directorsData.bio: Mr. Saleh is the Chief Financial Officer at Al-Mutlaq Real Estate Investment Company. He has over 15 years of practical experience in financial management and accounting in the real estate sector. He holds a Bachelor's degree in Accounting from the Arab Open University in Jordan, and has obtained various professional certificates and courses in accounting and financial management.

footer.about1: Manager of the diversified Eric REIT investment fund.
footer.about2: A Saudi company licensed by the Capital Market Authority with license number (37-11156).
